channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for OR
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for OR

item.title: Report E-2024050006
item.description:
Report E-2024050006

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-03T15:12:25+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-22
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On April 22, 2024, two (2) 30-gallon drums of UN3264 had faulty packaging and released approximately less than one (<1) gallon of product to the tops of the drums and pallet. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from GrayMar Environmental (GME) to remediate the impacted site. GME personnel utilized rags to remediate the impacted area. The crew then overpacked the two (2) damaged drums in two (2) 55-gallon drums for disposal. All impacted materials were containerized in one (1) 15-gallon drum. All waste was staged onsite for disposal.

item.title: Report X-2024041278
item.description:
Report X-2024041278

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-29T15:12:08+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-24
  • City: TROUTDALE
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PACKAGE NOTICED TO BE WET. INSPECTION REVEALED INNER 1 GALLON BOTTLE WAS BAGGED AND THE BAG CONTAINED LOOSE LIQUID. THE LIQUID LEAKED FROM BAG INTO OUTER CARTON. I CANNOT DETECT ANY HOLES OR CRACKS IN THE BOTTLE. SHIPPER IS SENDING 1 GALLON IN CARTON CAPBLE OF HOLDING 4 GALLONS WITH LITTLE INNER PACKING MATERIAL.

item.title: Report X-2024041348
item.description:
Report X-2024041348

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-29T15:12:08+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-19
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDED TO A PACKAGE DUE TO THE RATTLE OF AEROSOLS CANS. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED (12) 12 OUNCE AEROSOL CANS OF FLAMMABLE CUMMINS ONAN GREEN SPRAY PAINT. INNER BOXES MARKED WITH THE LIMITED QUANTITY MARKING. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX.
